author: JuliaRegistrator

comments.body:
Your `new package` pull request met all of the guidelines for auto-merging and is scheduled to be merged when the mandatory waiting period has elapsed.

---
If you want to prevent this pull request from being auto-merged, simply leave a comment. If you want to post a comment without blocking auto-merging, you must include the text `[noblock]` in your comment.
<!-- [noblock] -->
<!---
this_is_the_single_automerge_comment
--->

@DilumAluthge, I would like to request a quicker than usual merge of this PR.  I have a presentation relating to this work on Tuesday morning and it would be ideal if the package was already available in the package manager before the presentation. 

[noblock]

I've created release `v0.1.0`, [here](https://github.com/lanl-ansi/PowerModelsSecurityConstrained.jl/releases/tag/v0.1.0) it is.
<!-- 5aea0e00-510b-11ea-9a02-1869430f98fa -->
